name: Pixalate
overview:
Pixalate is the most advanced and first real time analytic SaaS based platform for Online Advertising, specifically solving big data challenges in Display and Mobile Real Time Bidding (RTB) Markets.

We have already built a very sophisticated and industry’s first Real time Analytics and Optimization Engine for Digital advertising.

Pixalate empowers Online Media companies to load,crunch, terabytes of Ads data into our big data system without writing one line of code or SQL statement.
